content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warning: "no ingredients to smelt"; fuel inventory contains coal (2 units) and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER; electrical_id: 6976.
- ElectricityGroup (id=6976) connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points: (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds ~200 units of water at 15°; connection points: (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output point: (-7.5, 24.5); updated fluid_system: [25220].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point: (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; updated fluid_system: [25220].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25220 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status: WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25221 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25222 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25227 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25226 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25231 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25230 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=25233 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Repeated PipeGroup Connection Failures:
  - Multiple connection attempts using fluid_system identifiers (24876, 24919, 24962, 25005, 25048, 25091, 25134, 25177) repeatedly failed to provide the necessary water supply to the steam engine.
  - Use the currently assigned working fluid_system (25220) from the boiler and offshore pump for subsequent connection attempts.

• Fixed Delay for Pipeline Stabilization:
  - Fixed 10-second delays between connection attempts do not confirm pipeline readiness.
  - Incorporate dynamic readiness checks to verify connectivity before retrying connection operations.
